problems.title: Decomposing a Velocity Vector
problems.text: A ball is thrown at 25 m/s at an angle of 40° above the horizontal. Find the horizontal and vertical components of velocity.

checkpoints.question: Horizontal component Vx = v cos(40°). cos(40°) ≈ 0.766. So Vx ≈ ?

error_patterns.diagnosis: You used sin(40°) instead of cos(40°) for the horizontal component.
You forgot to decompose. The full velocity is 25 m/s, but the horizontal component requires cos(40°).

checkpoints.question: Vertical component Vy = v sin(40°). sin(40°) ≈ 0.643. So Vy ≈ ?

error_patterns.diagnosis: You used cos(40°) instead of sin(40°) for the vertical component.
